body.p: The item is a palette of available template.XULElem("toolbar") items. It is not displayed, but is used by the toolbar customization dialog to display the list of items. The children of the toolbarpalette should be the complete list of template.XULElem("toolbarbutton")s and template.XULElem("toolbaritem")s that can be added to the toolbar. Do not add the various spacing items, as those are added automatically.
You can add your own custom buttons to the Firefox browser by using an template.XULElem("overlay") that overlays the toolbarpalette with the template.XULAttr("id") BrowserToolbarPalette.
body.pre: <toolbarpalette id="BrowserToolbarPalette"> <toolbarbutton id="toolbarpalette-button" class="toolbarbutton-class" label="&mylabel;" tooltiptext="&mytiptext;" oncommand="somefunction()" /> </toolbarpalette>
